title: "CGI and Helsinki University Hospital develop AI solution for reviewing brain CT scans and detecting brain hemorrhages"
excerpt: "CNW/ - CGI (TSX: GIB.A) (NYSE: GIB) has partnered with Helsinki University Hospital and Planmeca, a leading manufacturer of high-tech digital imaging devices, to develop an artificial intelligence (AI) solution that assists radiologists in interpreting brain CT scans and detecting the most common types of non-traumatic brain hemorrhages."
